.container
Traditions
Our restaurant
Welcome to The Chianti Room in charming downtown St. Augustine. Cobblestone streets, horse drawn carriages, & classic Spanish architecture set the scene for an unforgettable experience. Let us combine the rich heritage of Italian cuisine with modern American techniques to create an exceptional meal with family and friends!
The restaurant’s open layout encourages you to take in the sights and sounds of bottles popping, glasses clinking, and pasta twirling that remind us of family gatherings and special occasions. Please sit back, relax, and let us take you on a dining experience that will create memories that last a lifetime!
view our gallery
old fashioned attitude
always from scratch
Our award winning pizza is only the beginning. For the true Italian food connoisseur, follow our alleyway through our secluded courtyard and enter our full-service Italian restaurant. Wine and dine from our extensive wine list, complete liquor bar, and old country entrées, which are sure to please even the pickiest pallet.
For two generations, the Pizzalleys family has pledged to honor our time-tested recipes with the freshest & best quality ingredients. Our “FROM SCRATCH” old fashioned attitude will fill your memory with mouthwatering flavors you will come to savor with each visit…
MANGIA! MANGIA!
VIEW OUR MENU

Welcome to the Chianti Room, where passion meets culinary craftsmanship! Our team is a vibrant mosaic of talent, each member bringing their unique flair and expertise to the table.
Let's take a moment to introduce the masterminds behind the delectable dishes that grace your plates:
Andrew Olsen
General Manager
